description: When the device receives a FIP Notification packet,it gets VLANs from the packet, and compares with
configuration at the inputing-port, if it's not same, exports warning.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEPortLoseVlan HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEIfName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVlan i 9999

description: This FCoE interface name is sent from device.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEIfName

description: This VLAN is sent from device.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVlan

description: When the device receives a FIP Notification packet,it gets VLANs from the packet, and lookup at the
configuration , if it's not exist, exports warning.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVLanError HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEIfName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVlan i 9999

description: This FCoE interface name is sent from device.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEIfName

description: This VLAN is sent from device.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVlan

description: The number of vf-port has reached max limits 64.

event.Summary: Number of VF port reached maximum limit 64

description: This FCoE port resource is reach max limit.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEPortResource

description: The number of online vn-ports has reached max limits 256.

event.Summary: Number of online VN ports $v3 reached maximum limit 256

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoELoginVnNum HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEInstName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVFPortNum i 9999 HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVNPortNum i 9999

description: The FCoe instance name.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEInstName

description: The FCoE VF Port number.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVFPortNum

description: The FCoE VN Port number.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVNPortNum

description: The number of VN_Ports that belong to the same NPV instance exceeds the number of MAC addresses.

event.Summary: VN ports $v3 exceeded MAC limit in NPV instance

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoETnNum HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVsId i 9999 HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwSysMacNum i 9999 HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVNPortNum i 9999

description: The Fcoe-port Index.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVsId

description: The system mac-address number.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwSysMacNum

description: The FCoE VN Port number.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEVNPortNum

description: The requested vlan is different from the configued NPV vlan.

event.Summary: Requested VLAN differs from configured NPV VLAN

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoETnPortVlan HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEInstName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwTNPortVlan i 9999 HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEFcfVlan i 9999

description: The FCoe instance name.
variables.name: HUAWEI-FCOE-MIB::hwFCoEInstName

description: The detect vlan is different from the configued vlan.

description: The Fcf vlan is different from the configued vlan.
